name: Off Grid (itch) (Bad_Dad)
description:
Farm your land, forage in the forest and escape up the mountain. Off Grid, the survivalist/prepper roleplay come economic simulator. The ultimate "stuck at home in a pandemic" fantasy. Centered around the home; Sleep, eat, fire, farm and forage, use your surplus food to buy goods at the shop, go on adventures and share your stories in the pub. No guns here, however.

UP; ArrowUp, w

DOWN; ArrowDown, s

LEFT; ArrowLeft, a

RIGHT; ArrowRight, d

A Button; Alt, z, j

B Buttn; Control,k, x

START; Enter

SELECT; Shift

Hints: Don't eat all your loaves in one go, you only need to eat one a day. If you don't know what to do next, go to bed. Interact with everything. Visit the Pub for helpful advice. Pray at the shrine for luck. Plant corn in your garden, takes about 3 days to grow. Just go up to the ploughed square to throw seed or harvest mature corn.
